info.name: Outlook Web App 2010 for Mobile
info.description: This style reorganizes the Outlook Web App for Exchange 2010 interface into a mobile friendly page. In addition, the styling is updated to look more like a modern application. This style should work on pages with a messenger.example.com or outlook.example.com URL. If this doesn't meet your organizations URL, please let me know. This style is still under development, please read the additional info before installing.
info.additionalInfo:
Due to the lack of viewport tags on the OWA 2010 pages, it is necessary to always apply the styles. It is therefore recommended that this style only be installed on your mobile device. Label Sets Toolbar labels are provided in a separate stylesheet:
  • English: https://userstyles.org/styles/139469/labels-english-outlook-web-app-2010-for-mobile
  • Fran√ßais: https://userstyles.org/styles/139470/labels-fran-ais-outlook-web-app-2010-for-mobile
Notice: NB: This style is under development. The following components have been completed:
  • Loging/logout page
  • Header
  • Side Bar (in all pages)
  • Toolbar (in all pages)
  • Message List
  • Read and Write Emails
Other sections such as contacts and calendar are not yet complete. Release History 2017-02-18: Initial release of login/logout page styles 2017-02-25: Added styles for the header and the side bar on all pages 2017-02-26: Added styles to email content, including the message list, read and write
